Package blf.core.exceptions

Class ExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • blf.core.exceptions.ExceptionHandler
  • public class ExceptionHandler
extends Object
    This class is responsible for handling all of the exceptions that happen during runtime. The exception handler is instantiated in the ProgramState and its reference should be used to handle every possible exception.
    See Also:
    ProgramState
